name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Review of Atomic and Molecular structure
3. Alkenes and friends
4-5. Alkenes, alkynes, and Aromatic Compounds
6. 第一次考試
7. Heteroatom-containing Functional Group
8-9. Purification and Identification of Organic Compounds: Mass, UV/Vis, and IR
10-11. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy
12. 第二次考試
13-14. Stereochemistry
15. Introduction to Mechanism
16-17. Nucleophilic Substitution at Saturated Carbon
18. 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry (A Mechanistic Approach)
Penny Chaloner
